DarkestMod:StressRelic.NAME: Stress Builds.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of combat gain #b1 Stress .

DarkestMod:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2

DarkestMod:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.
